column4: can anyone help me with ffmpeg? I need to make a video a lot smaller(filesize, not resolution), and I think ffmpeg is the way to do it?
- i  use ffmpeg to convert videos for PocketPC, it works great
You'll need to compile in mp3 support though in all probability
I need to make a video under 300 MB (for facebook) and under 100 MB for youtube. Its currently like... 400 MB, and its a .mov
